product_name: Lodge Camp Dutch Oven Liners - Package of 8
long_description: Spend less time scrubbing dishes and more time making S'mores! Lodge Camp Dutch Oven liners let you cook your meal, then toss the liners for lightning fast, water-free clean-up. 100% biodegradeable parchment paper. Compact box design makes it easy to pack and stow the liners. 8 liners (20 in. diameter) are included in a single box.
short_description: Spend less time scrubbing dishes and more time making S'mores! Lodge Camp Dutch Oven liners let you cook your meal, then toss the liners for lightning fast, water-free clean-up.
